sentences.sContent: The paper introduces the working principle of the whole system of gold foil manipulating automaton and PLC control system.
sentences.sContent_eng: The paper introduces the working principle of the whole system of gold foil manipulating automaton and PLC control system.
sentences.sCn: 介绍了金箔装叠精细操作机器人自动化系统总体工作原理及PLC控制系统原理。

sentences.sContent: Man like every other animal is by nature indolent. if nothing spurs him on then he will hardly think and will bahave from habit like an automaton.
sentences.sContent_eng: Man like every other animal is by nature indolent. if nothing spurs him on then he will hardly think and will bahave from habit like an automaton.
sentences.sCn: 人如其他动物一样本性慵懒，如果没有什么鞭策著他，他几乎不思考，只是象机器人一样按照习惯去做。

remMethod.val: auto (自己) + mat (思考) + (i) on (表名词) → 能自己思考 → 机器人

words.tran: 自动的；无意识的；必然的
自动地；机械地；无意识地
自动作用；[医] 自动症；自动性
自动化（automate的过去分词）；自动操作

trans.tranOther: a machine, especially one in the shape of a human, that moves without anyone controlling it
